summary: This Mod adds a Conjuration Spell for a bound pickaxe to the game.
descriptionHtml:
--- Bound Pickaxe Spell ---

This Mod adds a new Conjuration Spell to the game. It summons a Bound Pickaxe for the player (3 minutes).

Location of the Spell Tomes:
- Whiterun / Breezehome / next to the Alchemy Table on the right
- Winterhold College / Hall of Attainment / Players room, on the end table right beside the bed

Installation

Simply put the BoundPickaxe.esp file into the Data Directory of your Skyrim Installation
author: m4d3
